title: Calories in Watermelon Slices
meta_description: Discover calories in watermelon slices, including macros like carbs and sugars, per-slice breakdown, and easy tweaks for your snack.
assumptions: Fresh, seedless watermelon; each slice ≈ 150 g (1-inch thick wedge from medium melon, rind removed).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, size, and portion; values are approximate. Check fresh produce labels or apps for precision.

quick_answer.text: Two watermelon slices (300 g) provide about 90 kcal, mostly from natural sugars with high water content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: With 1 oz feta cheese per slice

faqs.q: How many calories in one watermelon slice?
faqs.a: About 45 kcal for a 150 g slice.

faqs.q: Are watermelon slices low in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, two slices are only 90 kcal, making them a hydrating, low-cal snack.

faqs.q: How much sugar in watermelon slices?
faqs.a: Two slices have ≈18.6 g natural sugars, mostly fructose.
Yes, about 0.6 g fiber per 150 g slice, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Calories in watermelon slices vs. other fruits?
faqs.a: Lower than many; e.g., similar to cantaloupe but higher water content reduces density.
